extension.description: Jackett (0.7.1437) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from applications (CouchPotato, Mylar, SickRage, Sonarr, etc.) into tracker-site-specific HTTP queries, parses the HTML response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping and translation logic, removing the burden from other applications.
